BOQ Code Item UOM QTY Rate Amount
{{ row.boq_code }}{{ row.item }} {{ row.uom }}{{ row.quantity }}{{ frappe.format_value(row.rate, {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}{{ frappe.format_value(row.amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency" })}}
Total: {{ frappe.format_value(doc.total_amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
Total Amount (A): {{ frappe.format_value(doc.total_amount,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Price Adjustment (B) : {{ frappe.format_value(doc.price_adjustment,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Invoice Amount Claimed : {{ frappe.format_value(doc.claimed_amount,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Invoice Amount Received (C) : {{ frappe.format_value(doc.received_amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Balance Amount (D=A+B-C) : {{ frappe.format_value(doc.balance_amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
This print is system generated and should be considered VALID only with appropriate seal and/or signature.
